name: Shopping Cart Lancelot
description:
Real medival tournament, two knighs fighting for glory and fame in deadly battle market... in the woods for some reasons.

Code {Damian Woroniecki & Marcin Rzepisko}

3D And art- Łukasz And Kuba Sprada, Oskar Krupiński Satnislav Mykityuk And Szymon Wawruch

Lvl. - Szymon Wawruch

Musical master piece -Lukasz Sprada
